snippet: What the Obama administration should do about the controversy over contraception, health care and Catholic institutions.
abstract: What the Obama administration should do about the controversy over contraception, health care and Catholic institutions.

byline.original: By DAVID BROOKS and GAIL COLLINS

lead_paragraph: Gail Collins: David, I was kind of glad to discover that we have a disagreement about President Obama's decision to require Catholic hospitals and universities to cover contraceptives in their health insurance plans. Generally, when the topic turns to sex - gay marriage, abortion rights - we're pretty much on the same page. That makes for boring conversations.

headline.main: Should Obama Have His Own Plan B?
